metadata.description: The name of the container group to create.
The name of the container to create.

variables.description: Variables for an Azure Container Instance flow run.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name given to infrastructure created by a worker.

env.title: Environment Variables
env.description: Environment variables to set when starting a flow run.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: Labels applied to infrastructure created by a worker.

command.title: Command
command.description: The command to use when starting a flow run. In most cases, this should be left blank and the command will be automatically generated by the worker.

image.title: Image
image.description: The image to use for the Prefect container in the task. This value defaults to a Prefect base image matching your local versions.

resource_group_name.title: Azure Resource Group Name
resource_group_name.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group in which to run Prefect ACI tasks.

subscription_id.title: Azure Subscription ID
subscription_id.description: The ID of the Azure subscription to create containers under.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description: A list of user-assigned identities to associate with the container group. The identities should be an ARM resource IDs in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

entrypoint.title: Entrypoint
entrypoint.description: The entrypoint of the container you wish you run. This value defaults to the entrypoint used by Prefect images and should only be changed when using a custom image that is not based on an official Prefect image. Any commands set on deployments will be passed to the entrypoint as parameters.

image_registry.title: Image Registry (Optional)
image_registry.description: To use any private container registry with a username and password, choose DockerRegistry. To use a private Azure Container Registry with a managed identity, choose ACRManagedIdentity.

cpu.title: CPU
cpu.description: The number of virtual CPUs to assign to the task container. If not provided, a default value of 1.0 will be used.

gpu_count.title: GPU Count
gpu_count.description: The number of GPUs to assign to the task container. If not provided, no GPU will be used.

gpu_sku.title: GPU SKU
gpu_sku.description: The Azure GPU SKU to use. See the ACI documentation for a list of GPU SKUs available in each Azure region.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: The amount of memory in gigabytes to provide to the ACI task. Valid amounts are specified in the Azure documentation. If not provided, a default value of  1.0 will be used unless present on the task definition.

aci_credentials.title: Aci Credentials
aci_credentials.description: The credentials to use to authenticate with Azure.

stream_output.title: Stream Output
stream_output.description: If `True`, logs will be streamed from the Prefect container to the local console.

task_start_timeout_seconds.title: Task Start Timeout Seconds
task_start_timeout_seconds.description: The amount of time to watch for the start of the ACI container. before marking it as failed.

task_watch_poll_interval.title: Task Watch Poll Interval
task_watch_poll_interval.description: The number of seconds to wait between Azure API calls while monitoring the state of an Azure Container Instances task.

DockerRegistry.title: DockerRegistry
DockerRegistry.description:
Connects to a Docker registry.

Requires a Docker Engine to be connectable.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to log into the registry with.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to log into the registry with.

registry_url.title: Registry Url
registry_url.description: The URL to the registry. Generally, "http" or "https" can be omitted.

reauth.title: Reauth
reauth.description: Whether or not to reauthenticate on each interaction.

ACRManagedIdentity.title: ACRManagedIdentity
ACRManagedIdentity.description:
Use a Managed Identity to access Azure Container registry. Requires the
user-assigned managed identity be available to the ACI container group.

registry_url.title: Registry URL
registry_url.description: The URL to the registry, such as myregistry.azurecr.io. Generally, 'http' or 'https' can be omitted.

identity.title: Identity
identity.description: The user-assigned Azure managed identity for the private registry.

AzureContainerInstanceCredentials.title: AzureContainerInstanceCredentials
AzureContainerInstanceCredentials.description:
Block used to manage Azure Container Instances authentication. Stores Azure Service
Principal authentication data.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The service principal client ID. If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.

tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: The service principal tenant ID.If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The service principal client secret.If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.

credential_kwargs.title: Additional Credential Keyword Arguments
credential_kwargs.description: Additional keyword arguments to pass to `ClientSecretCredential` or `DefaultAzureCredential`.
